currency_conversion.description: Quickly convert between different currencies using up-to-date or historical exchange rates

debt_simplification.description: Automatically simplify group debts to reduce the number of transactions needed between friends

groups_and_friends.description: Can create multiple groups or add balance directly. Everything will be consolidated
groups_and_friends.title: Groups and Friends

i18.description: Available in multiple languages to make expense splitting accessible worldwide
i18.title: Internationalization

import_splitwise.description: Don't have to manually migrate balances. You can import users and groups from splitwise
import_splitwise.title: Import from splitwise

multiple_currencies.description: Need to add expense with different currency for same user? No problem!
multiple_currencies.title: Multiple currencies

open_source.description: Which makes it hard to become evil. Easy to self host
open_source.title: Open source

push_notifications.description: Never miss important notifications. Get notified when someone adds an expense or settles up
push_notifications.title: Push notification

pwa_support.description: Love mobile apps? We got you covered. Install it as a PWA and you won't even notice!
pwa_support.title: PWA support

unequal_split.description: Advanced split options. By shares, percentage or exact amounts.
unequal_split.title: Unequal Split

upload_receipts.description: Upload receipts along with the expense
upload_receipts.title: Upload Receipts
